description: A self-contained housing unit that occupies part of a building.
A building that functions as a home, offering a variety of spaces.
A small, self-contained apartment with an open floor plan.
A large, open space with few or no interior walls, often converted from an industrial building.
A large and luxurious residence, often located in a scenic area.
A small, quaint house, typically in a rural or semi-rural location.
A wooden house with a steep roof, often found in mountain regions.
A small, simple house made of wood, typically located in a remote area.
A large, grand house, typically with luxurious amenities.
A large, fortified building with towers and walls, often with a historical or medieval style.
